welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Roxana, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and delicious cuisine that our charming city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Roxana has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tortuguero Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal is available for charter flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
